   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File: config_dynamic_SUITE
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Description:
   25: %%% Test suite for common_test which tests the userconfig functionality
   26: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: -module(config_dynamic_SUITE).
   28: 
   29: -compile(export_all).
   30: 
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: 
   33: %% This suite will be run with dynamic userconfig
   34: %% test_driver.erl is compliant to ct_config_* callback
   35: %% and test_server is simple server for getting runtime-changing data
   36: %% which will return the list with the following variables:
   37: %% localtime = the erlang:localtime() result in list [{date, Date}, {time, Time}]
   38: %% node = erlang:node() - can be compared in the testcase
   39: %% now = os:timestamp() - easier to compare than localtime()
   40: %% config_server_pid - pid of the config server, should NOT change!
   41: %% config_server_vsn - .19
   42: %% config_server_iteration - a number of iteration config_server's loop done
   43: %% disappearable_variable - hereAmI - will be absent on even iterations
   44: 
   45: suite() ->
   46:     [
   47:      {timetrap, {seconds,10}}
   48:     ].
   49: 
   50: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(_) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: all() -> [test_get_known_variable, test_localtime_update,
   57: 	  test_server_pid, test_disappearable_variable,
   58: 	  test_disappearable_variable_alias].
   59: 
   60: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: end_per_testcase(_, _) ->
   64:     ok.
   65: 
   66: % test that usual config works
   67: test_get_known_variable(_)->
   68:     Node = erlang:node(),
   69:     0.19 = ct:get_config(config_server_vsn),
   70:     Node = ct:get_config(node),
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: % localtime will be updated in 5 seconds, check that
   74: test_localtime_update(_)->
   75:     Seconds = 5,
   76:     LT1 = ct:reload_config(localtime),
   77:     timer:sleep(Seconds*1000), % don't want scaling of this timer
   78:     LT2 = ct:reload_config(localtime),
   79:     case is_diff_ok(LT1, LT2, Seconds) of
   80: 	{false, Actual, Exp}->
   81: 	    ct:fail(io_lib:format("Time difference ~p is not ok, expected ~p", [Actual, Exp]));
   82: 	true->
   83: 	    ok
   84:     end.
   85: 
   86: % server pid should not change
   87: test_server_pid()->
   88:     [{require, cfvsn, config_server_vsn}].
   89: test_server_pid(_)->
   90:     Pid = ct:get_config(config_server_pid),
   91:     Pid = ct:reload_config(config_server_pid),
   92:     Vsn = ct:get_config(config_server_vsn),
   93:     % aliases remain after config reloading
   94:     Vsn = ct:get_config(cfvsn),
   95:     ok.
   96: 
   97: % test that variables may disappear from the config_2_SUITE
   98: test_disappearable_variable(_)->
   99:     % ask CT for config_server_iteration variable
  100:     Iter = ct:reload_config(config_server_iteration),
  101:     % here we should reload this variable in case it's odd
  102:     if Iter rem 2 == 1->
  103: 	Iter2 = ct:reload_config(config_server_iteration),
  104: 	Iter2 = Iter+1;
  105: 	true->ok
  106:     end,
  107:     % now disappearable_variable should be in place
  108:     hereAmI = ct:get_config(disappearable_variable),
  109:     % and now it should disappear
  110:     undefined = ct:reload_config(disappearable_variable).
  111: 
  112: % alias of disappearable_variable should disappear too
  113: test_disappearable_variable_alias(_)->
  114:     % the same rules apply for this testcase as for previous one
  115:     Iter = ct:reload_config(config_server_iteration),
  116:     Iter2 = if
  117: 	Iter rem 2 == 1 ->
  118: 	    NewIter = ct:reload_config(config_server_iteration),
  119: 	    NewIter = Iter+1;
  120: 	true->
  121: 	    Iter
  122:     end,
  123:     ct:require(diav, disappearable_variable),
  124:     hereAmI = ct:get_config(disappearable_variable),
  125:     hereAmI = ct:get_config(diav),
  126:     ct:reload_config(disappearable_variable),
  127:     undefined = ct:get_config(disappearable_variable),
  128:     % after reloading, it's even again
  129:     Iter3=ct:get_config(config_server_iteration),
  130:     Iter3 = Iter2+1,
  131:     % and alias does not exist
  132:     undefined = ct:get_config(diav).
  133: 
  134: my_dt_to_datetime([{date, D},{time, T}])->
  135:     {D, T}.
  136: 
  137: is_diff_ok(DT1, DT2, Seconds)->
  138:     GS1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(my_dt_to_datetime(DT1)),
  139:     GS2 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(my_dt_to_datetime(DT2)),
  140:     ct:log("Checking diff~n"
  141: 	   "DT1: ~p, gregorian seconds: ~p~n"
  142: 	   "DT2: ~p, gregorian seconds: ~p~n"
  143: 	   "Diff: ~p",
  144: 	   [DT1,GS1,DT2,GS2,GS2-GS1]),
  145:     if
  146: 	GS2-GS1 > Seconds+Seconds/2;
  147: 	GS2-GS1 < Seconds-Seconds/2->
  148: 	    {false, GS2-GS1, Seconds};
  149: 	true->
  150: 	    true
  151:     end.
